Our Treatments

Comprehensive, premium dental care under one roof. We prioritize your comfort in every procedure.

01

Smile Makeovers & Veneers

A completely customized smile design using ultra-thin porcelain veneers.

We analyze your facial features to design a smile that fits you perfectly. Our pain-free preparation ensures your natural teeth are preserved while giving you the Hollywood smile you've always wanted.

Book Assessment View Care Guide
02

Dental Implants

The gold standard for replacing missing teeth.

Implants provide a permanent solution that looks, feels, and functions like natural teeth. We use 3D guided surgery for precision and faster healing.

Book Assessment
03

Clear Aligners & Braces

Straighten your teeth without the hassle.

Choose between invisible clear aligners or traditional braces. We customize the plan to fit your lifestyle and timeline.

Book Assessment View Care Guide
04

Root Canal Therapy

Save your tooth with our pain-free rotary endodontics.

Forget the horror stories. Our modern root canal procedures are efficient, comfortable, and designed to save your natural tooth from extraction.

Book Assessment View Care Guide
05

Teeth Whitening

Instant brightness for special occasions.

We offer both in-office power whitening (1 hour) and take-home kits. Safe, effective, and results that wow.

Book Assessment
06

Bridges & Crowns

Restore damaged or missing teeth.

High-strength Zirconia crowns that look completely natural. No more metal lines or artificial-looking teeth.

Book Assessment

Unsure what you need?

Book a consultation and let Dr. Anam guide you.
